Title: Sea of Flames Safety Rules
Text:
1. The Sea of Flames is strictly off-limits to unauthorized personnel. Any unauthorized individuals who attempt to enter will face consequences for their actions. Those with authorization must adhere to the operation regulations.
2. Before entering the Sea of Flames, proper authorization and qualification certificates are required.
3. Protective gear must be worn before entering the Sea of Flames. Resonators must wear heat insulators and suction wires, while non-resonators should only enter if necessary and with additional protective clothing in special circumstances.
4. It is prohibited to work in the Sea of Flames for more than 3 hours at a time. If any physical or mental discomfort arises during operation, leave immediately and seek medical attention.
5. Regular psychiatric assessments are mandatory for personnel working in the Sea of Flames for an extended period of time to prevent potential risk of psychosis.
